_sText:
TITLE: de_mentalhospital_beta
DEVELOPER: BENDER
E-MAIL: jacobsummer@hotmail.com
WEBSITE: www.MercEx.net
DATE RELEASED: September 2007
File Size: 13.5MB
Spawnpoints: 32T / 32CT
HDR Lighting: Supported
-------------------------------------
INTRODUCTION - MAP WALK THROUGH
<object width="325" height="266"><param name="movie" value="http://www.youtube.com/v/PpWARUoOxoI&rel=1&border=0"></param><param name="wmode" value="transparent"></param><embed src="http://www.youtube.com/v/PpWARUoOxoI&rel=1&border=0" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" wmode="transparent" width="325" height="266"></embed></object>

MAP TEASER TRAILER DEBUT AUG 2007
<object width="325" height="266"><param name="movie" value="http://www.youtube.com/v/kabTFGbq4Rc&rel=1&border=0"></param><param name="wmode" value="transparent"></param><embed src="http://www.youtube.com/v/kabTFGbq4Rc&rel=1&border=0" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" wmode="transparent" width="325" height="266"></embed></object>
-------------------------------------
DESCRIPTION:
	Terrorists have identified a weakness in the city power grid, whereby cutting power at the junction inside the mental hospital, will cut both main and back-up power to security systems at a nearby arms facility. Comrades-in-arms are depending on a successful take-down. An inside agent has tipped off SWAT to when the strike will occur.
-------------------------------------
Thank You to anyone who enjoys and plays this map:
   -The Merciless Exiles Clan for their unwavering support in my mapping. [www.MercEx.net]
   -The Snarkpit crew for technical support. [www.snarkpit.net]
   -The 4HM Clan for their continued support. [4hm.net/forum/]
   -FPS Banana for a fantastic hosting resource. [www.fpsbanana.com]
   -YouTube.com for hosting promo videos. [search de mentalhospital]
   -My wife who knows how much I enjoy mapping.
   -All my PLAY TESTERS:[MercEx] H4ckroot, Bre, wolgy, beansy, darkness, mr kola [4HM] Archangel_666, teN AnImalS, tarzan15, fenix 807, takun, [Urban-Assault] VampeD, Achilles. 
And anyone I forgot to mention, thanks for the help!
-----------------------------------
PLEASE EMAIL ME ANY COMMENTS OR IF YOU WOULD LIKE TO HELP WITH A CUSTOM NAV MESH OR FPS PERFORMANCE TWEAKS. THANKS!
JACOBSUMMER@HOTMAIL.COM
-----------------------------------
Known BUGS/GLITCHES:
-Snow in CT Spawn will occasionally stop falling after leaving CT spawn (reason unknown)
-Fog in basement areas randomly changes colors between rounds(reason unknown)
-Map Intro Text cuts off thanks you's to Beta Testers short, see above for complete list. (has something to do with spacing and using enter in Notepad???)
-Bots WILL GET STUCK and attempt to go through wall in upper hall near T-Side stairs when they are trying to get down. (nav mesh was computer generated, i do not know how to tweak it properly)
-Bots will 99% of the time navigate the map with no problems at all.
-Triggered sounds might play and then quickly restart if another player triggers it shortly after the first one does.
-Some props disappearing for performance-trade-off reasons may be visible to the player
